title: Thyme meringue, lemon curd, celery sorbet and celeriac
description: Try something new at home by pulling out one or two of the easier elements of this tricky recipe.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need an ice cream maker, a blender and a dehydrator.
ingredients: ½ celeriac, peeled, thinly sliced on a mandoline
½ tsp fresh thyme, finely chopped
